about.title: About
about.text: I’m Alexis Germain, a freelance web developer specialized in building modern and immersive websites. With expertise in Vue/Nuxt and React/Next, I design fast and high-performance interfaces. I bring projects to life with smooth animations using Framer Motion & GSAP, interactive 3D with Three.js, and a strong attention to detail — delivering unique experiences that make brands stand out.
